SELECT * FROM fd_organization WHERE 1=1
AND name LIKE concat('%',#{organization.name},'%')
AND code LIKE concat('%',#{organization.code},'%')
AND is_enabled = #{organization.enabled}
AND( name LIKE concat('%',#{param},'%') OR code LIKE concat('%',#{param},'%') )

SELECT DISTINCT fd_organization.* FROM fd_organization JOIN iam_member_role ON fd_organization.id = iam_member_role.source_id AND iam_member_role.source_type = "organization" WHERE iam_member_role.member_id = #{memberId}
AND fd_organization.is_enabled = true

SELECT DISTINCT fd_organization.* from fd_organization where id in ( SELECT DISTINCT fp.organization_id from fd_project fp LEFT JOIN iam_member_role imr on imr.source_id=fp.id and imr.source_type="project" WHERE imr.member_id=#{memberId})
AND fd_organization.is_enabled = true

SELECT fd_organization.id, fd_organization.code, fd_organization.name, fd_organization.is_enabled, fd_project.id AS project_id, fd_project.name AS project_name, fd_project.code AS project_code, fd_project.organization_id, fd_project.is_enabled AS project_is_enabled FROM fd_organization LEFT JOIN fd_project ON fd_organization.id = fd_project.organization_id WHERE fd_project.is_enabled = TRUE

SELECT fo.name AS organizationName, fo.code AS organizationCode, ir.name AS roleName, ir.code AS roleCode FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN fd_organization fo ON imr.source_id = fo.id INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id WHERE imr.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT fo.name AS organizationName, fp.name AS projectName, fp.code AS projectCode, ir.name AS roleName, ir.code AS roleCode FROM iam_member_role imr INNER JOIN fd_project fp ON imr.source_id = fp.id INNER JOIN iam_role ir ON imr.role_id = ir.id INNER join fd_organization fo ON fp.organization_id = fo.id WHERE imr.member_id = #{memberId}
